QuestData.Title: Wine Shop Advert
QuestData.Description: If you talk to anyone about wine, then you know we Gallinas sell the best wine in Stormwind. And we're not far, still in the Trade District along the city's lovely canals.$B$BHere, take this pamphlet. Bring it to my sister Suzetta at our shop for a complimentary bottle of the famous Dalaran Noir. You won't regret it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Gallina Winery, and bring Suzetta Gallina the Wine Ticket for a free bottle of wine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings and welcome, $gmaster:madam;. Have you yet tried one of our fine wines?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, so you've seen Renato? Well here you are, $gsir:ma'am;. A bottle of our special Dalaran Noir. You'll not find its equal in all of Azeroth!
